revision.text:
__FORCETOC__ '''Events''' are limited-time durations in which players are given the chance to capture unique Pokémon. Events usually occur in conjunction with real-world holidays (e.g. Halloween, Christmas), or coincide with the anniversary of important events in the Pokémon franchise (e.g. release of the first movie, release of ''Pokémon GO''). In most cases, the special Pokémon are added to region [[Roaming Pokémon|Roamer]] pools.
=== List of Events ===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Event !! Unlock Time !! Event Pokémon !! Where to find event Pokémon !! Other Pokémon |- | Lunar New Year || January 24 - February 7 || [[File:Vivillon_(Fancy).png|50px]] Vivillon (Fancy) || Added as Roaming Pokémon in [[Kalos]] || <center>--- |- | Flying Pikachu || July 6 - 12 || [[File:Flying Pikachu.png|50px]] Flying Pikachu || Added as Roaming Pokémon in [[Kanto]] || <center>--- |- | rowspan=4|Armored Mewtwo || rowspan=4|July 18 - 24 || [[File:Armored Mewtwo.png|50px]]Armored Mewtwo || Armored Mewtwo added as rare spawn in [[Cerulean Cave]] || rowspan=4|<center>--- |- | [[File:Bulbasaur_(clone).png|50px]]Bulbasaur (clone) || rowspan=3|Clone Pokémon added as roaming Pokémon in [[Kanto]] |- | [[File:Charmander_(clone).png|50px]]Charmander (clone) |- | [[File:Squirtle_(clone).png|50px]]Squirtle (clone) |- | rowspan=3|Halloween || rowspan=3|Oct 30 - Nov 5 || [[File:Spooky Bulbasaur.png|50px]]Spooky Bulbasaur || Added to all [[Kanto]] Route Pokémon pools || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly added to all [[Kanto]] Route Pokémon pools |- | [[File:Spooky Togepi.png|50px]]Spooky Togepi || Added to [[Johto]] Route Pokémon pools || [[File:Misdreavus.png|40px]] Misdreavus added to all [[Johto]] Route Pokémon pools |- | [[File:Pikachu(Gengar).png|50px]]Pikachu (Gengar) || Added to [[Hoenn]] Route Pokémon pools || [[File:Shuppet.png|40px]],[[File:Duskull.png|40px]] Shuppet and Duskull added to all [[Hoenn]] Route Pokémon pools |- | rowspan=2|Let's GO! || rowspan=2|November 16-23 || [[File:Let's_Go_Eevee.png|50px]]Let's Go Eevee || rowspan=2|Added as Roaming Pokémon in [[Kanto]] || rowspan=2|<center> --- |- | [[File:Let's_Go_Pikachu.png|50px]]Let's Go Pikachu |- | Christmas || Dec 24 - 30 || [[File:Santa_Snorlax.png|50px]]Santa Snorlax || Added as Roaming Pokémon in all [[Regions]] || <center> |}
=== Suggestions for New Events ===
We are always looking for new ideas for events to be implemented in the future. Suggestions can be submitted on the [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Pokéclicker Discord].
[[Category:Unique Pokémon]]
revision.comment: /* List of Events */ New Lunar New Year Event 0.8.3
